title: Expose Pico Provider APIs to third-party driver developers
body: I have a project that would really benefit from the new Pico Process mechanism, but it appears that only WSL is allowed to use it. Please consider exposing and documenting the API in future WDK releases.

comments.body: Pico Providers are implemented by kernel-mode drivers, which already have to be signed.
Problem is that this could enable easy creation of rootkits without sig enforcement.
